changes.reasoning: Reorganize TrackingVisualizer to use reasoning as the main organizational unit. Changed from grouping by file to grouping by logical change/reasoning. Each reasoning block now displays all files that were modified to accomplish that specific goal. Files can appear multiple times if they were modified for different reasons.

Remove unused tracking injection logic from DiffViewer. Cleaned up the component by removing the inline reasoning injection code and debug console.logs, since we now handle reasoning display at a higher level in the parent components.

Update PRDiffViewer to match the new reasoning-first structure. Added logic to group file changes by reasoning instead of showing files first. Includes commit SHA and message with each reasoning block. Falls back to file-based display when no tracking data exists.
